page.title: 03WORK PATTERNS,SOMERFORD AREA
page.content: We invited local people to answer a questionnaire about their work and 42 replied.Of these 13 worked locally, mostly in farming,while 29 commuted to the following places;10 worked in Swindon,7 in Bath,5 in Chippenham,4 in Malmesbury,3 in London,2 in Lyneham camp,1 in Oxford and 1 in Christian Malford. Swindon is one of the fastest growing towns in Europe,especially in the micro-technology industries. People can get to the larger towns either by the M4 motorway or by train from Chippenham, which is only one hour from London. From our survey we learned that people choose to live here because it is rural,pleasant and is within easy reach of their places of work.
